item.title: Blooming Bliss

item.description: Embrace the beauty of springtime with this enchanting bouquet of blooming flowers.

item.title: Garden Whispers

item.title: Fresh Blossoms

item.title: Pastel Radiance

item.description: Delight in the gentle and soothing radiance of pastel blooms with this serene bouquet.

item.title: Dried Floral Bouquet
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Dried Floral Bouquet from our Captivating Collection. Celebrate the season of renewal with our exquisite dried floral bouquet. Each carefully preserved bloom captures the essence of spring, adding a touch of nature's elegance to any space. Embrace the lasting beauty and delicate charm of our spring-inspired collection
item.content:encoded: Dried Floral Bouquet from our Captivating Collection. Celebrate the season of renewal with our exquisite dried floral bouquet. Each carefully preserved bloom captures the essence of spring, adding a touch of nature’s elegance to any space. Embrace the lasting beauty and delicate charm of our spring-inspired collection

item.title: Sweet & Pretty Bouquet
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Delicate blooms intricately arranged to create a captivating display of beauty and elegance. This enchanting bouquet is designed to bring joy and a touch of sweetness to any recipient. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or simply brightening someone's day with a heartfelt surprise.
item.content:encoded: Delicate blooms intricately arranged to create a captivating display of beauty and elegance. This enchanting bouquet is designed to bring joy and a touch of sweetness to any recipient. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or simply brightening someone’s day with a heartfelt surprise.
